Image class¶

cvbot.images.Image

Class functions¶

image.show(pos=None)¶

Shows the image on a separate window

Parameters:

pos (tuple(int, int) or None) – Optional “pos” position of displayed window is tuple of x and y coordinates.

Examples:

  • Showing an image of a screen region

from cvbot.capture import get_reigon

img = get_region((100, 100, 300, 300))
img.show()
